resources.string:
Notify your friends when you Drop the Mic, and experience the power of the Cogswell.io platform:

Be social!
• When you install this app, you will step onto a global stage. Drop the Mic, and everyone who has subscribed will be notified.
• Find a friend or two to download this app: You\'ll learn when they Drop the Mic, and they will be notified when you Drop the Mic.
• You can just tap your phone instead of dropping it.
• You can enter any name you want.
• You can subscribe and unsubscribe at any time.
• You will send Mic Drop notifications as long as the app is running, even if your screen is off.

Be a developer!
• This app demonstrates the Cogs massively-parallel high-throughput distributed message broker system using GSM and a rules engine to set the impact threshold.
• The impact sensor runs in the background, and only sends events if a minimum impact is sensed.
• Cogswell also includes a rules engine and NoSQL DB.
• All of this power can be in your hands: We have SDKs in C#, Java, javascript, Android and iOS.
• Write your own app: https://cogswell.io/#!/api-docs
